data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Maramureș, Romania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maramureș, Romania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 29,021 believers in the state of Maramureș to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Maramureș, Romania.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Maramureș. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bashkir people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Maramureș, Romania not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 29,021 believers in the state of Maramureș the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maramureș, Romania has a population of 458,500.

We estimate Maramureș has 29,021 people who might know Jesus, 400,390 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 29,089 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Maramureș, Romania to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
